title: Relive Hamilton's French Grand Prix win
description: Live text and audio commentary of the French Grand Prix, where Lewis Hamilton wins.
content:
A slow pit stop for Valtteri Bottas - an issue with the jack by the looks of it - and it costs him three places.

Sebastian Vettel comes in to take his five-second penalty, and changes from softs to ultrasofts. Vettel comes out in fifth, as he went in.
